== Focus Groups ==
== DRAFT ==

=== Why ===

 {*} This structure will help members get better connection with lp.

 {*} Will help it's members to practice locally, in preparation for participating globally.

 {*} Will help collecting same-interested persons in one place, thus better performance and output.

 {*} Will help showing up talented members in one field, rather than straying in the wide team.

=== How ===

 {*} Create separate page for each team, with members' photos in body-top.

 {*} Make each team free to choose it's means and to adjust it's performance locally.

 {*} FGs owned by Council.

 {*} One '''''Elected''''' Administrator for each FG.

 {*} One person can administer only '''one''' FG at a time.

=== Specializations ===

 {*} '''Support Squad:'''
** Watch all teams' resources for support requests and help with answering them.
** This <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IRC/SupportersGuide|Guide]]</nowiki> gives a good example of the best practice.
** Joining:
** Create a Launchpad account, sign CoC, Join ubuntu-eg then propose to ~ubuntu-eg.support.
** Pass Expertise test.

 {*} '''Treasurers:'''
** Collect funding, either internal or external.
** Save and keep teams finance.
** Inform Council regularly about current team's finance status.
** Expend team's fund as needed and trace how it had been expended.
** Joining:
** Create a Launchpad account, sign CoC, Join ubuntu-eg then propose to ~ubuntu-eg.treasurers.
** Pass Expertise test.
** 
** 
** 

 {*} '''Organizers:'''
** Prepare for upcoming events:
** Finding Venues.
** Arranging Venues booking.
** Schedule event's sessions/classes and arrange them according to best fit.
** Manage Events while it's happening:
** Help with on-time happenings during events.
** Respond to attendees requests.
** Work closely with inviter(s) to hold requested event(s).
** Work closely with Marketing and Treasurers to bring Events in best shape possible.
** Joining:
** Create a Launchpad account, sign CoC, Join ubuntu-eg then propose to ~ubuntu-eg.organizers.
** Pass Expertise test.
